name: "The Fields" Tee-Shirts
description: Prove your dedication as a fan to the band by buying a tee-shirt. This shirt helps spread the word about us as a band and includes our myspace website. The myspace url was chosen due to the other links that are up on our myspace. We currently have a facebook, myspace, youtube, and ourstage account. These all are updated with the latest info about the band so you can see what we're up to. Shirts come in all sizes and you can choose from black, yellow, green, or blue.

name: You Can Find Anything
description:
The Fields have been working very hard this year on all their songs. This summer they plan on recording their favorites and putting them together for the public to own. This is their first album and they hope you enjoy it as much as they do.
Estimated release: August 2012
